name: Germ Freak 2 - Clean Teeth Contest
description:
” Exceptional Sound effects.”
”Striking Graphics.”
”Massive Exciting levels.”
___________________________________

The competition of the brains is on again. How big is your brain? Germ Freak 2 is an incredible game for people of all ages. Your challenge in this game is to go around the playing board as quickly as possible by passing the various germs. Can you win and get to the finish line first? Well, it's not as easy as it seems!

+++ GAME FEATURES +++
Individual graphics and sound settings
Atmospherically dense level based soundtrack
Massive exciting levels
